title: Enter to Win a Dreamy Specialized Crux from RedShift Sports
content:
Who doesn’t love a good dream bike build? I know I do. Well, there is still time to enter to win this gravel dream bike from RedShift Sports. The dreamy build uses the Specialized CRUX frame and fork, and looks to be chocked full of some tasty bits.

The winner will receive everything below. Let’s take a gander…

  • RedShift ShockStop system: PRO Seatpost and PRO Stem…smooth out the chatter on the trail with these bits.
  • RedShift Kitchen Sink Handlebars: Including Top & Drop grips… get comfy.
  • Specialized CRUX Frame: Big tire clearance, performance geo, and… “the lightest gravel bike in the world”.
  • Gravel and Road wheelsets: Swap between a deeper profile Roval road wheelset and the Reserve 25 gravel wheels with the Industry 9 Torch Hubs
  • SRAM Drivetrain: The snappy and precise Rival AXS Group…

Enter to Win the RedShift Sports Dream Bike here…

Hurry, there’s still time for you to win this dream bike. The contest ends on November 11, 2023. Enter and be the one lucky winner to add this beaut to your quiver. Add your email address and get entered here!

You can also check out more of what RedShift Sports has to offer by visiting the link below.
